ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Returning To Norrath
ygData.msgSnippet: heh just saw some of your questions As far as low lvl poeple in the guild goes, most of the low lvl types are not so low any more.  I d say around 15-20.  We
ygData.messageBody:
heh just saw some of your questions

As far as low lvl poeple in the guild goes, most of the low lvl types are
not so low any more. I'd say around 15-20. We made a bucnh of new iksars
so we played togehter with them a lot in the early days of their
adventures. I'm sure we could help you lvl up if you need it. I would
recommend that you play any charchter that suites you, dont worry about
our needs....but it's be nice to have another cleric , heh, or a druid
heh. But dont let me pressure you :P They fixed alchemy for Shamans FYI,
but appply poison is not done yet, very soon they say, so feel free to
amke a rouge (i hear there is an absolutely fantastic weapon in Kunark
that is probobly going to need to be adjusted as it is doing ungodly
amounts of dmg with backstab!) :) Verant has stated that they are pretty
muich done with balancing all the classes, so they said that you wont see
many changes in the future with any of the classes. they are concetrating
on adding new content rathher than adjusting classes since they feel they
are essentially done. heh, whatveer charchter you make, i cant wait to
see you!

-joe Fentus
On Fri, 9 Jun 2000, David Lari wrote:

> Hello everyone,
>
> After a long hiatus, I have decided to return to the world or Norrath. Since
> the guild seems to be doing well on Rodcet Nife, and I have to start over
> from scratch anyway, I figured I'd create a character or two on that server.
>
> Are there any people in the guild who have low level characters there that I
> could group with? If so, what race/class should I play to complement them?
>
> I haven't followed all the various nerfs since I quit, so I don't know what
> would be a good class to play anymore. If there is one in particular that I
> should avoid (have they ever finished the rogues?) please let me know.
>
> Once I get back online, I'll publish my character info to the list and I'll
> certainly give a tell in game.
>
> Hugs,
> David
>
>
